TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CryptoStream extends System.IO.Stream implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 定義連結資料流與密碼編譯轉換的資料流。

span.span: Defines a stream that links data streams to cryptographic transformations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Common language runtime 會使用密碼編譯資料流為導向的設計。The common language runtime uses a stream-oriented design for cryptography. 這項設計的核心是。The core of this design is . 任何密碼編譯物件實作可以鏈結在一起可實作的任何物件，因此一個物件的資料流的輸出可以放入另一個物件的輸入。Any cryptographic objects that implement can be chained together with any objects that implement , so the streamed output from one object can be fed into the input of another object. 中繼結果 （從第一個物件的輸出） 不需要分開儲存。The intermediate result (the output from the first object) does not need to be stored separately. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接呼叫其方法，也就會呼叫其實作。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly by calling its method, which in turn calls its implementation. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 您應該一律明確地關閉您物件完成後使用藉由呼叫方法。You should always explicitly close your object after you are done using it by calling the method. 如此一來排清基礎資料流，並造成所有剩餘所要處理的資料區塊物件。Doing so flushes the underlying stream and causes all remaining blocks of data to be processed by the object. 不過，如果發生例外狀況才能呼叫方法，物件可能不會關閉。However, if an exception occurs before you call the method, the object might not be closed. 若要確保一律會呼叫方法，您呼叫方法內`finally`區塊`try` / `catch`陳述式。To ensure that the method always gets called, place your call to the method within the `finally` block of a `try`/`catch` statement. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用加密字串。The following example demonstrates how to use a to encrypt a string. 這個方法會使用類別具有指定和初始化向量 ()。This method uses class with the specified and initialization vector (). [!code-csharp[Cryptography.Rijndael.Create.File#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.rijndael.create.file/cs/fileexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.Rijndael.Create.File#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.rijndael.create.file/vb/fileexample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會包裝的型別呼叫實作。This method wraps a call to the type's implementation. 呼叫`Dispose`允許所使用的資源都重新配置用於其他用途。Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 如需有關`Dispose`，請參閱[清理向上 Unmanaged 的資源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`disposing 參數設定為具有方法`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 會透過將處置設定為 `Dispose` 而叫用 `false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with disposing set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫，請小心不要參考到先前處置之前呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

public override void Flush ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Flush ()
public: override void Flush();

summary.span: 清除目前資料流的所有緩衝區，並且造成所有緩衝資料都寫入基礎裝置。

span.span: Clears all buffers for the current stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清除資料流不會清除其基礎的編碼器，除非您明確地呼叫或。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or . 設定至`true`表示從緩衝區資料流，清除資料，但並不會清除編碼器狀態。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 這可讓編碼器將保存其狀態 （部分字元），讓它可以正確編碼字元的下一個區塊。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 這種情況下會影響 UTF8 及 UTF7 其中某些字元可以只編碼的編碼器接收或多個相鄰的字元之後。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. > [!NOTE] > 您應該可以呼叫方法或方法來完成排清緩衝區。You should call either the method or the method to complete flushing the buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task FlushAsync (System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task FlushAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
public: override System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ FlushAsync(System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 用來監視是否有取消要求的語彙基元。

span.span: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

param.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

summary.span: 以非同步的方式清除目前資料流的所有緩衝區，造成所有緩衝資料都寫入基礎裝置，並且監視取消要求。

span.span: Clears all buffers for the current stream asynchronously, causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device, and monitors cancellation requests.

returns.span: 表示非同步排清作業的工作。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須在開頭上呼叫與`await`(C#) 或`Await`(Visual Basic) 運算子，暫停執行方法，直到工作完成。You must preface your call to with the `await` (C#) or `Await` (Visual Basic) operator to suspend execution of the method until the task is complete. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 Async 和 Await 進行非同步程式設計](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7). 如果在作業完成之前將其取消，則傳回的工作包含值屬性。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

span.span: The stream has been disposed.

summary.span: 以緩衝區的目前狀態更新基礎資料來源或存放庫，並接著清除緩衝區。

span.span: Updates the underlying data source or repository with the current state of the buffer, then clears the buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法會呼叫。Calling the method will call . 如果您不會呼叫，呼叫完成排清緩衝區。If you do not call , call to complete flushing the buffer. 呼叫只有當資料流的所有活動完成都時。Call only when all stream activity is complete.

span.span: The key is corrupt which can cause invalid padding to the stream.

exception.span: 目前的資料流無法寫入。

span.span: The current stream is not writable.
-or-
The final block has already been transformed.

span.span: The result can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the stream has been reached.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 寫入資料的來源緩衝區。

span.span: The buffer to write data from.

param.span: buffer 中以零為起始的位元組位移，即開始將位元組寫入到資料流的位置。

span.span: The zero-based byte offset in buffer from which to begin writing bytes to the stream.

param.name: count
param.span: 寫入的最大位元組數。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to write.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 用來監視是否有取消要求的語彙基元。

span.span: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

param.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

summary.span: 以非同步的方式將一連串的位元組寫入目前的資料流，依寫入的位元組數將資料流中目前的位置往前移，並且監視取消要求。

span.span: Writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream asynchronously, advances the current position within the stream by the number of bytes written, and monitors cancellation requests.

returns.span: 表示非同步寫入作業的工作。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須在開頭上呼叫與`await`(C#) 或`Await`(Visual Basic) 運算子，暫停執行方法，直到工作完成。You must preface your call to with the `await` (C#) or `Await` (Visual Basic) operator to suspend execution of the method until the task is complete. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 Async 和 Await 進行非同步程式設計](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7). 如果在作業完成之前將其取消，則傳回的工作包含值屬性。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

span.span: is .
or is negative.
